subject: RE: [EVP-ITC] Re: An alternative to the usual ghost hunter stuff.

Rick~

 

I'll pose this question to your test.  How do you know the perso=
n is receiving information from a third-party spirit and not a telepathic c=
onnection to you?

 

When I was teaching psychic classes I printed or cut =
out a bunch of pictures then shoved them into identical envelopes.  I would=
 then wouldn't know which one they had and there were far more then student=
s so ...  And some weren't even pictures, simply a single color square.

 
=

This would make a true blind test and elimate the "telepathic" connection =
theory.

 

You could do the same with your number, just write bunch down p=
ull one from random and set it up on top of a book shelf without looking at=
 it.

 

~Lori




"My life is boring, my fantasies are a theme park." 
--A=
nne Rice  Responding to an interviewer who just did not get it. 


 



To:=
 EVP-ITC@yahoogroups.com
From: rasterer@...
Date: Sat, 11 Apr 2009 20=
:25:38 +0000
Subject: [EVP-ITC] Re: An alternative to the usual ghost hunte=
r stuff.







If anyone feels like calibrating their board, or wants to k=
now if they can get accurate information from it, I have written down a num=
ber between 1 and a billion (1,000,000,000)

Let me know what your board th=
inks it is. 
If it gets it correct, sounds like you've got something import=
ant going on there!

If it can't get it correct, I suppose that brings into=
 suspect all its other answers.

--- In EVP-ITC@yahoogroups.com, "threadsin=
tyme@..." <Threadsintyme@...> wrote:
>
> Hi Lori,
> Glad that you brought t=
his up! A true medium can give you a lot of the details that Ouija boards c=
an't. They can also give you complete names, dates, info that is totally un=
known to others (except for those directly involved). 
> There are some exc=
ellent readings on YouTube and I don't mean the crappy ones...I forgot what=
 this one guy's name was (he is in spirit now) but he could tel you details=
!! I almost my skin chill...
> I will see if I can locate some of those hig=
hly respected members of Spiritualism and will post those here for all of y=
ou to watch.
> Blessings,
> Al
>

rom boredom, that's what I do.
>

 why bother. When people ask me I usually suggest that if they want to comm=
unicate with ... whatever why not develop the ability yourself. - ya, I'm o=
ne of those who believe anyone can.
> 
> There's always the question in the=
 back of your mind whether your partner's moving it. The intentions of "wha=
t" you are talking to. Not to mention it's too slow and limited.
> 
> Besid=
es if you take the time to develop the ability you can get more texture in =
the information. Asking the board "where you married?" may get you a "yes" =
but a psychic might get the sense of a religious or civil ceremonhy, the ga=
rment(s) worn, other's in the party, or whether that Being approved/disappr=
oved of their spouse (ie was it a reluctant union).
> 
> ~Lori
